<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/api/v1/workspaces/{slug}/projects/{project_id}/states/{state_id}/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Partially update an existing workflow state's properties like name, color, or group.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
